section.title: Adding a Security Group
section.para: A user or administrator can change the network offering that is associated with an existing guest network.

listitem.para: Log in to the CloudPlatform UI as an administrator or end user.
In the left navigation, choose Network
In Select view, choose Security Groups.
The new security group appears in the Security Groups Details tab.
To make the security group useful, continue to Adding Ingress and Egress Rules to a Security Group.
